text: James Hood (16 May 1948 - 4 December 2017) was a Scottish Labour Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) from 1987 until 2015. He represented the Clydesdale constituency until 2005, and the Lanark and Hamilton East thereafter. Hood died on 4 December 2017 of a heart attack in Lanarkshire, Scotland, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * constituency website in use while Hood was an MP Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Politicians from South Lanarkshire Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Jimmy Hood
